ygData.subject: Re: rts and skull of jhen tra
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes as far as I know this is not a rumor.  The skull can be combined with the staff to make the same or similar weapon that the Pries of Discord uses. I m not
ygData.messageBody:
Yes as far as I know this is not a rumor. The skull can be combined with
the staff to make the same or similar weapon that the Pries of Discord uses.
I'm not sure if this is actually implented in the game yet but I have heard
that this is indeed the purpose.

-----Original Message-----
From: Justin Howard <mhoward1@...>
To: EverQuest@onelist.com <EverQuest@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, May 28, 1999 9:45 PM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] rts and skull of jhen tra


>From: "Justin Howard" <mhoward1@...>
>
>I dont think its just a rumor though..... for example the skull is a lore
>item (quest item) and the rumor says... the skull can be combined with the
>staff.. it makes perfect sense when you think about it.
>
>Who knows it might be a rumor...
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Chris_Mattos@... <Chris_Mattos@...>
>To: jannus_@... <jannus_@...>; everquest@onelist.com
><everquest@onelist.com>

>

>>From: Chris_Mattos@...
>>
>>From what I understand, this is a rumor started when people realized the
>Priest of Discord had a staff with a skull on it.
>>
>>Jumdar
>>
>>-----Original Message-----
>>From: jannus_@... [mailto:jannus_@...]

>>To: everquest@onelist.com
>>Subject: [EverQuest] rts and skull of jhen tra

>>From: "Jannus Malus" <jannus_@...>
>>
>>I've heard that the runed totem staff and skull of jhen tra can be used
>>together/in conjunction with each other, yet there is no obvious way to do
>>this. Is this information wrong, or am I just missing something? Thanks
>in
>>advance.
>>Jannus
